content.text: Ninth is a New World pirate who allied himself with Whitebeard.
Ninth is a tall man with dark hair and a scar on his forehead. He has long sideburns, a pointed nose and a rather long chin.
Not much is known of Ninth's personality, other than that he was willing to fight to save Ace.
Ninth is a fearsome pirate who has managed to achieve an infamous reputation in the New World, and to make an alliance with Whitebeard. It is still unknown what abilities and weapons he possesses.
Some time prior to the current storyline, Ninth became a known pirate in the New World, and allied himself with Whitebeard.
When Portgas D. Ace was to be executed at Marineford, Ninth and his crew joined forces with the Whitebeard Pirates to save him.
He is first seen running with Andre and Rush when Ace was shouting to Luffy. He is maybe review after, hanging the attack of Pacifistas, a man who look likes Ninth is seen pierced by a laser.
He, along with the rest of the crew, attended Whitebeard and Ace's funeral on a undisclosed island somewhere in the New World.

elements.text: ↑  One Piece Manga — Vol. 57 Chapter 558, Ninth makes his debut.
↑  One Piece Green: Secret Pieces, Ninth's name is revealed.
